text: The Directorate-General for Communication (DG COMM) is a Directorate-General of the European Commission. The mission of the DG Communication is: * To inform the media and citizens of the activities of the European Commission and to communicate the objectives and goals of its policies and actions. * To inform the Commission of the evolution of opinion in the Member States. The DG Communication is based in Brussels. ==External links== * Communication Category:General Services in the European Commission
title: Directorate-General for Communication
